participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Active and determined, Alex enjoys maintaining a fit lifestyle and values companionship with her dogs.
participant_1.background: i have short hair. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Jordan finds joy in exploring various interests, from sports to literature.
participant_2.background: i try various coffees as a hobby. i am a huge star wars fan. i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry.
